recommendationReason: All 52 tests passed successfully with 100% code coverage on all metrics (statements, branches, functions, lines). Tests follow project standards, are comprehensive, and cover all business rules, validations, edge cases, and workflows.
notes: Tests follow all project standards from .claude/rules/tests.md
All factory methods thoroughly tested (create, reconstitute)
All status transitions tested (start, complete, fail, retry)
Validation rules properly enforced and tested
Error handling and edge cases covered
No external dependencies in unit tests
Tests are independent and can run in any order
Metadata management and computed getters validated
